entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
